description: Request for an Environmental Impact Assessment (EIA) Scoping Opinion under Regulation 15 of the Town and Country Planning (Environmental Impact Assessment) Regulations 2017 (as amended), in respect of the removal of any remaining structures and clearance of the site, followed by construction of two buildings comprising of a tall building, approximately 60 storeys (220.00m above ordnance datum ('AOD')) in height with a separate smaller building adjacent to the south, between approximately 4-6 storeys (30.00-45.00m AOD). The Proposed Development comprises a build to rent residential scheme comprising up to approximately 700 units including residential amenity spaces, and approximately 7,500m2 of non-residential uses which could comprise retail, co-working/office space, education, leisure, cultural and/or community uses at the ground and lower levels of the proposed buildings.
